mapper.select: SELECT location_id, ride_id, (coordinates).latitude latitude, (coordinates).longitute longitude, time FROM location
SELECT location_id, ride_id, (coordinates).latitude latitude, (coordinates).longitute longitude, time FROM location WHERE location_id = #{locationId}
SELECT location_id, ride_id, (coordinates).latitude latitude, (coordinates).longitute longitude, time FROM location WHERE ride_id = #{rideId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO location (ride_id, coordinates, time) VALUES (#{location.rideId}, ROW(#{location.coordinates.latitude}, #{location.coordinates.longitude}), #{location.time})
mapper.update: UPDATE location SET (ride_id, coordinates, time) = (#{location.rideId}, ROW(#{location.coordinates.latitude}, #{location.coordinates.longitude}), #{location.time}) WHERE location_id = #{locationId}
